profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.3.2 Font types - Subtype entry
profile.description: All fonts used in a conforming file shall conform to the font specifications defined in PDF Reference 5.5. Subtype - name - (Required) The type of font; must be "Type1" for Type 1 fonts, "MMType1" for multiple master fonts, "TrueType" for TrueType fonts "Type3" for Type 3 fonts, "Type0" for Type 0 fonts and "CIDFontType0" or "CIDFontType2" for CID fonts
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: All fonts used in a conforming file shall conform to the font specifications defined in PDF Reference 5.5. Subtype - name - (Required) The type of font; must be "Type1" for Type 1 fonts, "MMType1" for multiple master fonts, "TrueType" for TrueType fonts "Type3" for Type 3 fonts, "Type0" for Type 0 fonts and "CIDFontType0" or "CIDFontType2" for CID fonts
rule.test: Subtype == "Type1" || Subtype == "MMType1" || Subtype == "TrueType" || Subtype == "Type3" || Subtype == "Type0" || Subtype == "CIDFontType0" || Subtype == "CIDFontType2"

error.message: A Font dictionary has missing or invalid Subtype entry
